00010 #ifndef _RAW_DATA_H_
00011 #define _RAW_DATA_H_
00012 
00013 #include "SlidingWindow.h"
00014 #include "CodecInfo.h"
00015 
00016 class RawData
00017 {
00018 private:
00019         SlidingWindow *_slidingWindow;
00020         FILE **_files;
00021         MVCMasterThreadHandle thread;
00022         static int RawDataWriter(void *param)
00023         {
00024                 RawData *self = (RawData *)param;
00025                 self->ProcessData();
00026                 return 0;
00027         }
00028 public:
00029         RawData(SlidingWindow *slidingWindow, const char *fileNames) : _slidingWindow(slidingWindow)
00030         {
00031                 int viewCount = CodecInfo::GetInstance().sps.viewCount;
00032                 char fileName[128];
00033                 _files = new FILE*[viewCount];
00034                 for (int i = 0; i < viewCount; ++i)
00035                 {
00036                         sprintf(fileName, fileNames, i);
00037                         _files[i] = fopen(fileName, "wb");
00038                         ASSERT(_files[i]);
00039                 }
00040                 thread = MVCCreateMasterThread(RawDataWriter, this);
00041         }
00042 
00043         ~RawData()
00044         {
00045                 int viewCount = CodecInfo::GetInstance().sps.viewCount;
00046                 MVCWaitMasterThread(thread);
00047                 for (int i = 0; i < viewCount; ++i)
00048                         fclose(_files[i]);
00049         }
00050 
00051         void ProcessData()
00052         {
00053                 int viewCount = CodecInfo::GetInstance().sps.viewCount;
00054                 int timeId = 0;
00055                 while (!_slidingWindow->IsDataFinished() || _slidingWindow->GetUnsaved()<_slidingWindow->GetFirstAvail())
00056                 {
00057                         while (timeId >= _slidingWindow->GetFirstAvail())
00058                                 Sleep(10);
00059                         for (int i = 0; i < viewCount; ++i)
00060                         {
00061                                 CodingPictInfo *cpi = _slidingWindow->GetCodingPictInfo(timeId, i);
00062                                 while (!(cpi->pictStatus&PICT_STATUS_FINISHED))
00063                                         Sleep(2);
00064                                 //printf("Writing %d %d\n", timeId, i);
00065                                 int size = cpi->Size_Width*cpi->Size_Height;
00066                                 fwrite(cpi->lumaStart, size, 1, _files[i]);
00067                                 fwrite(cpi->chromaUStart, size>>2, 1, _files[i]);
00068                                 fwrite(cpi->chromaVStart, size>>2, 1, _files[i]);
00069                                 cpi->pictStatus |= PICT_STATUS_SAVED;
00070                         }
00071                         ++timeId;
00072                         //_slidingWindow->IncreaseSaved();
00073                         //printf("TIMEID=%d, UNSAVED=%d\n", timeId, _slidingWindow->GetUnsaved());
00074                 }
00075         }
00076 };
00077 
00078 #endif //_RAW_DATA_H_
